GSP29nysu51xu:0: NySBh_5,1.0 sādharmya-vaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānasya vikalpāj jātibahutvam iti saṃkṣepeṇa+uktaṃ, tad vistareṇa vibhajyate --- tāḥ khalv imā jātayaḥ sthāpanā-hetau prayukte caturviṃśatiḥ pratiṣedhahetavaḥ /
GSP29nysu51xu:2: NySBh_5,1.1 jāteḥ saṃkṣepeṇa+uktāyā vistaro vaktavya iti+idānīm ārabhyate
GSP29nysu51xu:17: dravyaṃ loṣṭaḥ kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yuktaḥ kriyāvāṃs tathā ca+ātmā tasmāt kriyāvān iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:19: pratyavatiṣṭhate niṣkriya ātmā vibhuno dravyasya niṣkriyatvād vibhu
GSP29nysu51xu:20: ca+ākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ ca tathā ca+ātmā tasmān niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:22: viśeṣa-hetuḥ kriyāvat-sādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punar akriyasādharmyād niṣkriyeṇa+iti
GSP29nysu51xu:24: atha vaidharmyasamaḥ kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yukto loṣṭaḥ paricchinno dṛṣṭo na ca tathā+ātmā tasmān na loṣṭavat kriyāvān iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:26: ca+asti viśeṣa-hetuḥ kriyāvat-sādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ
GSP29nysu51xu:28: vaidharmyeṇa ca+upasaṃhāraḥ niṣkriya ātmā vibhutvāt kriyāvad dravyam avibhu dṛṣṭaṃ niṣkriyaṃ loṣṭaḥ na ca tathā+ātmā tasmān niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:29: vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dravyam ākāśaṃ kriyā-hetu-guṇa-rahitaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na ca tathā+ātmā tasmān na niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:30: na ca+asti viśeṣa-hetuḥ kriyāvad-vaidharmyān niṣkriyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ na
GSP29nysu51xu:32: / atha sādharmyasamaḥ kriyāvāṃl loṣṭaḥ kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yukto dṛṣṭaḥ tathā ca+ātmā tasmāt kriyāvān iti na ca+asti viśeṣa-hetuḥ kriyāvad-vaidharmyān
GSP29nysu51xu:33: niṣkriyo na punaḥ kriyāvat-sādharmyāt kriyāvān iti viśeṣa-hetv-abhāvāt
GSP29nysu51xu:37: pratijñāyamāne syād avyavasthā sā tu dharma-viśeṣe na+upapadyate
GSP29nysu51xu:38: go-sādharmyād gotvāj jāti-viśeṣād gauḥ sidhyati na tu sāsnā-ādi-sambandhāt
GSP29nysu51xu:39: / aśva-ādi-vaidharmyād gotvād eva gauḥ sidhyati na guṇa-ādi-bhedāt /
GSP29nysu51xu:41: ca+etat kṛta-vyākhyānam avayava-prakaraṇe pramāṇānām abhisambandhāc ca+eka-artha-kāritvaṃ samānaṃ vākye iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:47: kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yogāl loṣṭavat kriyāvān ātmā loṣṭavad eva sparśavān api prāpnoti /
GSP29nysu51xu:48: atha na sparśavāṃl loṣṭavat kriyāvān api na prāpnoti viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:51: loṣṭaḥ khalu kriyāvān avibhur dṛṣṭaḥ kāmam
GSP29nysu51xu:52: ātmā+api kriyāvān avibhur astu viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:53: khyāpanīyo varṇyo viparyayād avarṇyaḥ tāv etau sādhya-dṛṣṭānta-dharmau
GSP29nysu51xu:57: kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yuktaṃ kiṃcid guru yathā loṣṭaḥ kiṃcil laghu yathā vāyuḥ evaṃ kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yuktaṃ kiṃcit kriyāvat syād yathā loṣṭaḥ kiṃcid
GSP29nysu51xu:58: akriyaṃ yathā+ātmā viśeṣo vā vācya iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:60: dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ taṃ dṛṣṭānte prasañjayataḥ sādhyasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51xu:62: tathā+ātmā prāptas tarhi yathā+ātmā tathā loṣṭa iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:63: sādhyaś ca+ayam ātmā kriyāvān iti kāmaṃ loṣṭaḥ+api sādhyaḥ atha na+evaṃ na tarhi yathā loṣṭaḥ
GSP29nysu51xu:69: upamānaṃ yathā gaus tathā gavaya iti tatra na labhyo go-gavayayor
GSP29nysu51xu:79: NyS_5,1.7 prāpya sādhyam aprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyā+aviśiṣṭatvād
GSP29nysu51xu:81: NySBh_5,1.7 hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyaṃ sādhayed aprāpya vā ? na tāvat prāpya
GSP29nysu51xu:83: dvayor vidyamānayoḥ prāptau satyāṃ kiṃ kasya sādhakaṃ sādhyaṃ vā ? aprāpya sādhakaṃ na bhavati
GSP29nysu51xu:85: prāptyā pratyavasthānaṃ prāptisamaḥ aprāptyā pratyavasthānam aprāptisamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51xu:88: NySBh_5,1.8 ubhayathā khalv ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kartṛ-karaṇa-adhikaraṇāni
GSP29nysu51xu:89: prāpya mṛdaṃ ghaṭa-ādi-kāryaṃ niṣpādayanti abhicārāc ca pīḍane sati dṛṣṭam
GSP29nysu51xu:91: NyS_5,1.9 dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇa-anapadeśāt pratyavasthānāc ca pratidṛṣṭāntena
GSP29nysu51xu:93: NySBh_5,1.9 sādhanasya+api sādhanaṃ vaktavyam iti prasaṅgena pratyavasthānaṃ prasaṅgasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GSP29nysu51xu:94: kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yogī kriyāvāṃl loṣṭa iti hetur na+apadiśyate na ca hetum antereṇa siddhir asti+iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:96: kriyāvān ātmā kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yogād loṣṭavad ity ukte pratidṛṣṭānta upādīyate ---
GSP29nysu51xu:97: kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yuktam ākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dṛṣṭam iti kaḥ punar ākāśasya
GSP29nysu51xu:102: NySBh_5,1.10 idaṃ tāvad ayaṃ pṛṣṭo vaktum arhati atha ke pradīpam
GSP29nysu51xu:103: upādadate kim-arthaṃ vā+iti ? didṛkṣamāṇā dṛśya-darśana-artham iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:104: atha pradīpaṃ didṛkṣamāṇāḥ pradīpa-antaraṃ kasmān na+upādadate ? antareṇa+api
GSP29nysu51xu:107: atha dṛṣṭāntaḥ kim-artham ucyata iti aprajñātasya jñāpana-artham iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:110: sa khalu "laukika-parīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhi-sāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭānta" iti
GSP29nysu51xu:114: NySBh_5,1.11 pratidṛṣṭāntaṃ bruvatā na viśeṣahetur apadiśyate anena
GSP29nysu51xu:115: prakāreṇa pratidṛṣṭānataḥ sādhako na dṛṣṭānta iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:118: sa ca kathaṃ hetur na syāt ? yady apratiṣiddhaḥ sādhakaḥ syād iti //
GSP29nysu51xu:120: NySBh_5,1.12 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna-ānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte
GSP29nysu51xu:121: apara āha --- prāg utpatter anutpanne śabde prayatna-ānantarīyakatvam
GSP29nysu51xu:122: anityatva-kāraṇaṃ na+asti, tad-abhāvān nityatvaṃ prāptaṃ, nityasya
GSP29nysu51xu:126: NyS_5,1.13 tathā-bhāvād utpannasya kāraṇa-upapatter na kāraṇa-pratiṣedhaḥ
GSP29nysu51xu:128: utpannaḥ khalv ayaṃ śabda iti bhavati /
GSP29nysu51xu:129: prāg utapatteḥ śabda eva na+asti, utpannasya śabda-bhāvāc
GSP29nysu51xu:131: kāraṇa+upapatter ayuktaḥ+ayaṃ doṣaḥ "prāg utpatteḥ kāraṇa-abhāvād" iti //
GSP29nysu51xu:132: NyS_5,1.14 sāmānya+dṛṣṭāntayor aindriyakatve samāne nitya-anitya-sādharmyāt saṃśayasamaḥ
GSP29nysu51xu:133: NySBh_5,1.14 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna-ānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte
GSP29nysu51xu:134: hetau saṃśayena pratyavatiṣṭate --- sati prayatna-ānantarīyakatve asty
GSP29nysu51xu:135: eva+asya nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam aindriyakatvam, asti ca ghaṭena+anityena, ato nitya-anitya-sādharmyād anivṛttiḥ saṃśaya iti //
GSP29nysu51xu:137: NyS_5,1.15 sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyād ubhayathā vā
GSP29nysu51xu:140: NySBh_5,1.15 viśeṣād vaidharmyād avadhāryamāṇe+arthe puruṣa iti, na
GSP29nysu51xu:142: evaṃ vaidharmyād viśeṣāt prayatna-ānantarīyakatvād avadhāryamāṇe śabdasya+anityatve
GSP29nysu51xu:146: gṛhyamāṇe ca viśeṣe nityaṃ sādharmyaṃ saṃśaya-hetur iti na+abhyupagamyate
GSP29nysu51xu:147: / na hi gṛhyamāṇe puruṣasya viśeṣe sthāṇu-puruṣa-sādharmyaṃ saṃśaya-hetur
GSP29nysu51xu:150: NySBh_5,1.16 ubhayena nityena ca+anityena ca sādharmyāt pakṣa-pratipakṣayoḥ pravṛttiḥ prakriyā
GSP29nysu51xu:151: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna-ānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ekaḥ pakṣaṃ pravarttayati, dvitīyaś ca nitya-sādharmyāt pratipakṣaṃ pravarttayati --- nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāc chabdatvavad iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:152: evaṃ ca sati prayatna-ānantarīyakatvād iti hetur anitya-sādharmyeṇa ucyamāno na prakaraṇam ativarttate ,
GSP29nysu51xu:162: NySBh_5,1.17 ubhaya-sādharmyāt prakriyā-siddhaṃ bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyā-siddhir uktā bhavati /
GSP29nysu51xu:163: yady ubhaya-sādharmyaṃ, tatra ekataraḥ pratipakṣa ity evaṃ saty upapannaḥ pratipakṣo bhavati
GSP29nysu51xu:169: prakaraṇa+avasānāt, tattva-avadhāraṇe hy avasitaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhavati+iti
GSP29nysu51xu:171: NySBh_5,1.18 hetuḥ sādhanam, tat sādhyāt pūrvaṃ paścāt saha vā bhavet /
GSP29nysu51xu:172: yadi pūrvaṃ sādhanam, asati sādhye kasya sādhanam ? atha paścād, asati sādhane kasya+idaṃ sādhyam ? atha yugapat sādhya-sādane, dvayor vidyamānayoḥ kiṃ kasya sādhanaṃ kiṃ kasya sādhyam iti hetur ahetunā na
GSP29nysu51xu:178: nirvartanīyasya nirvṛttir vijñeyasya vijñānam ubhayaṃ kāraṇato dṛśyate,
GSP29nysu51xu:180: yat tu khalu+uktam asati sādhye kasya sādhanam iti ? yat tu nirvatyate yac ca vijñāpyate tasya+iti
GSP29nysu51xu:182: NySBh_5,1.20 pūrvaṃ paścād yugapad vā pratiṣedha iti na+upapadyate,
GSP29nysu51xu:185: NySBh_5,1.21 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna-ānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad iti sthāpite pakṣe artha-āpattyā pratipakṣaṃ sādhayataḥ+arthāpattisamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51xu:187: prayatna-ānantarīyakatvād anitya-sādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti, arthād āpadyate nitya-sādharmyān nitya iti, asti ca+asya nityena sādharmyam asparśatvam iti //
GSP29nysu51xu:189: NyS_5,1.22 anuktasya+artha-āpatteḥ pakṣa-hāner upapattir anuktatvād anaikānatikatvāc ca+artha-āpatteḥ
GSP29nysu51xu:190: NySBh_5,1.22 anupapādya sāmarthyam anuktam arthād āpadyate iti bruvataḥ
GSP29nysu51xu:191: pakṣa-hāner upapattir anuktatvāt, anitya-pakṣa-siddhāv arthād āpannaṃ nitya-pakṣasya hānir iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:194: yadi nitya-sādharmyād asparśatvād ākāśavac ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ, arthād āpanna, anitya-sādharmyāt
GSP29nysu51xu:198: na khalu vai ghaṇasya grāvṇaḥ patanam ity arthād āpadyate --- dravāṇām apāṃ patana-abhāva iti //
GSP29nysu51xu:202: upapadyata ity aviśeṣe ubhayor anityatve, sarva-aviśeṣaḥ prasajyate /
GSP29nysu51xu:213: sad-bhāva-upapatti-nimittaṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra syād iti, evaṃ khalu vai
GSP29nysu51xu:214: kalpyamāne anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sad-bhāva-upapatter iti pakṣaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP29nysu51xu:215: tatra pratijñā-artha-vyatiriktam anyad udāharaṇaṃ na+asti, anudāharaṇaś ca hetur na+asti+iti
GSP29nysu51xu:216: pratijñā-eka-deśasya ca+udāharaṇatvam anupapannam, na hi sādhyam udāharaṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nysu51xu:225: NySBh_5,1.25 yady anityatva-kāraṇam upapadyate śabdasya+ity anityaḥ śabdo nityatva-kāraṇam apy upapadyate+asya+asparśatvam iti nityatvam apy
GSP29nysu51xu:230: NySBh_5,1.26 ubhaya-kāraṇa-upapatter iti bruvatā na+anityatva-kāraṇa+upapatter anityatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate, yadi pratiṣidhyate na+ubhaya-kāraṇa-upapattiḥ syāt /
GSP29nysu51xu:233: vyāghātāt pratiṣedha iti cet, samāno vyāghātaḥ /
GSP29nysu51xu:235: nityatva-anityatva-prasaṅgaṃ vyāhataṃ bruvatā+uktaṃ pratiṣedha iti cet ?
GSP29nysu51xu:236: sva-pakṣa-para-pakṣayoḥ samāno vyāghātaḥ, sa ca na+ekatarasya sādhaka iti //
GSP29nysu51xu:245: NySBh_5,1.28 prayatna-ānantarīyakatvād iti bruvatā kāraṇata utpattir
GSP29nysu51xu:247: yadi ca kāraṇa-antarād apy utpadyamānasya śabdasya tad anityatvam upapadyate, kim atra pratiṣidhyata
GSP29nysu51xu:249: na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasya+anupalabdhiḥ, kasmāt ?
GSP29nysu51xu:271: NySBh_5,1.30 āvaraṇa-ādy-anupalabdhir na+asti, anupalambhād ity ahetuḥ /
GSP29nysu51xu:275: yad asti tad upalabdher viṣayaḥ, upalabdhyā tad asti+iti
GSP29nysu51xu:277: yan na+asti tad anupalabdher viṣayaḥ, anupalabhyamānaṃ
GSP29nysu51xu:280: upalabdhy-abhāve+anupalabdhau svaviṣaye pravarttamāno na svaviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhati /
GSP29nysu51xu:282: āvaraṇa-ādīni tu vidyamānatvād upalabdher viṣayāḥ, teṣām upalabdhyā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nysu51xu:284: svaviṣaya-pratipādikāyā abhāvād anupalambhād anupalabdher viṣayo gamyate --- na santy āvaraṇa-ādīni śabdasya+agrahaṇa-kāraṇāni+iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:285: anupalambhāt tv anupalabhiḥ sidhyati, viṣayaḥ sa tasya+iti //
GSP29nysu51xu:290: asti me saṃśayajñānaṃ na+asti me saṃśayajñānam iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:297: tad-anupalabdher anupalambhād abhāva-siddhir iti, etan na+upapadyate //
GSP29nysu51xu:301: anityaḥ śabda iti bruvataḥ+asti ghaṭena+anityena sarvabhāvānāṃ sādharmyam iti sarvasya+anityatvam aniṣṭaṃ sampadyate /
GSP29nysu51xu:302: saḥ+ayam anityatvena pratyavasthānād anityasama iti // NySBh_
GSP29nysu51xu:310: sādharmyād asiddheḥ pratiṣedhasya+apy asiddhiḥ, pratiṣedhyena sādharmyād iti //
GSP29nysu51xu:311: NyS_5,1.34 dṛṣṭānte ca sādhya-sādhana-bhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetutvāt tasya ca+ubhayathā-bhāvān na+aviśeṣaḥ //
GSP29nysu51xu:312: NySBh_5,1.34 dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhya-sādhana-bhāvena prajñāyate,
GSP29nysu51xu:314: sa ca+ubhayathā bhavati, kenacit samānaḥ kutaścid viśiṣṭaḥ /
GSP29nysu51xu:317: sādharmya-viśeṣo hetuḥ, na+aviśeṣeṇa sādharmya-mātraṃ vaidharmya-mātraṃ vā
GSP29nysu51xu:319: tulya-dharma-upapatteḥ sarva-anityatva-prasaṅgād anityasama" iti, etad ayuktam iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:320: aviśeṣasama-pratiṣedhe ca yad uktaṃ tad api veditavyam //
GSP29nysu51xu:321: NyS_5,1.35 nityam anitya-bhāvād anitye nityatva-upapatter nityasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51xu:323: tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde nityam atha+anityam ? yadi tāvat sarvadā bhavati ? dharmasya sadā
GSP29nysu51xu:324: dharmiṇaḥ+api sadā bhāva iti nityaḥ śabda iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:331: NySBh_5,1.36 pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anityatvasya bhāvād ity
GSP29nysu51xu:334: atha na+abhyupagamyate, nityam anityatvasya bhāvād iti hetur na bhavati+iti hetv-abhāvāt
GSP29nysu51xu:339: --- tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde sarvadā bhavati atha na+iti, ayam anupapannaḥ /
GSP29nysu51xu:340: kasmāt ? utpannasya yo nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasya tad anityatvam ; evaṃ ca saty adhikaraṇa-ādheya-vibhāgo vyāghātān na+asti+iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:342: nityatvam anityatvaṃ ca ekasya dharmiṇo dharmāv iti virudhyete, na sambhavataḥ /
GSP29nysu51xu:343: tatra yad uktaṃ --- nityam anityatvasya bhāvān nitya eva, tad avartamāna-artham uktam iti
GSP29nysu51xu:347: prayatna-anantaram ātma-lābhaḥ tat khalv abhūtvā bhavati, yathā
GSP29nysu51xu:348: ghaṭa-ādi-kāryam ; anityam iti ca bhūtvā na bhavati+ity etad vijñāyate /
GSP29nysu51xu:349: evam avasthite prayatna-kārya-anekatvād iti pratiṣedha ucyate /
GSP29nysu51xu:350: prayatna-anantaram ātma-lābhaś ca dṛṣṭo ghaṭa-ādīnām, vyavadhāna-apohāc
GSP29nysu51xu:364: bhavati+iti, na tu śabdasya+anupalabdhi-kāraṇaṃ kiṃcid upapadyate, yasya
GSP29nysu51xu:366: bhavati+iti, tasmād utpadyate śabdo na+abhivyajyate iti //
GSP29nysu51xu:367: hetoś ced anaikāntikatvam upapadyate anaikātikatvād asādhakaḥ syād iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:370: NySBh_5,1.39 pratiṣedhaḥ+apy anaikāntikaḥ, kiṃcit pratiṣedhati kiṃcin
GSP29nysu51xu:376: saḥ+ayam ubhaya-pakṣa-samo viśeṣa-hetv-abhāva ity ubhayam apy anaikātikam iti //
GSP29nysu51xu:379: yatra+aviśeṣo dṛśyate tatra+ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyata iti //
GSP29nysu51xu:381: NySBh_5,1.41 yaḥ+ayaṃ pratiṣedhe+api samāno doṣaḥ+anaikāntikatvam āpadyate
GSP29nysu51xu:384: prayatna-ānantarīyakatvād iti sādhana-vādinaḥ sthāpanā prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP29nysu51xu:389: samāno doṣa iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ vipratiṣedha ucyate /
GSP29nysu51xu:392: NyS_5,1.42 pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedha-vipratiṣedhe samāno
GSP29nysu51xu:394: NySBh_5,1.42 pratiṣedhaṃ dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya tad-uddhāram
GSP29nysu51xu:395: akṛtvā+anujñāya pratiṣedha-vipratiṣedhe tṛtīya-pakṣe samānam anaikāntikatvam iti samānaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prasañjayato dūṣaṇa-vādino mata-anujñā
GSP29nysu51xu:399: NySBh_5,1.43 sthāpanā-pakṣe prayatna-kārya-anekatvād iti doṣaḥ sthāpanā-hetu-vādinaḥ sva-pakṣa-lakṣaṇo bhavati /
GSP29nysu51xu:408: sva-pakṣa-lakṣaṇa-apekṣayā+upapadyamāna-doṣa-upasaṃhāre hetu-nirdeśe ca saty anena para-pakṣa-doṣaḥ+abhyupagato bhavati /
GSP29nysu51xu:409: kathaṃ kṛtvā ? yaḥ pareṇa prayatna-kārya-anekatvād-ity-ādinā+anaikāntika-doṣa uktaḥ, tam anuddhṛtya pratiṣedhe+api samāno doṣa ity āha /
GSP29nysu51xu:410: evaṃ sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe+api samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayataḥ
GSP29nysu51xu:412: yathā parasya pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedha-vipratiṣedhe+api samāno doṣaprasaṅgo mata-anujñā prasajyata iti, tathā+asya+api sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya
GSP29nysu51xu:413: pratiṣedhe+api samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayato mata-anujñā prasajyata iti /
GSP29nysu51xu:422: samāno doṣa" iti samāna-doṣatvam eva+ucyate, na+artha-viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti /
GSP29nysu51xu:429: tṛtīya-caturthayor mata-anujñā, prathama-dvitīyayor viśeṣa-hetv-abhāva iti ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayor asiddhiḥ /
GSP29nysu51xu:433: yadā tu "kārya-anyatve prayatna-ahetutvam anupalabdhi-kāraṇa-upapatter" ity anena tṛṭīya-pakṣo yajyate, tadā viśeṣa-hetu-vacanāt "prayatna-anantaram
GSP29nysu51xu:434: ātma-lābhaḥ śabdasya, na+abhivyaktir" iti siddhaḥ prathama-pakṣo na ṣaṭpakṣī pravartata iti
